| History                 = After the [[Siege (Event)|Siege]] of [[Asgard (Realm)|Asgard]], [[Anthony Stark (Earth-616)|Tony Stark]] decided to change his point of view and created a new company, '''Stark Resilient''', in order to create vehicles and technology using the repulsor tech from his [[Arc Reactor|R.T. node]]. The company started building an eco-friendly car, although [[Hammer Industries (Earth-616)|Hammer Industries]]' [[Sasha Hammer (Earth-616)|Sasha]] and [[Justine Hammer (Earth-616)|Justine Hammer]] tried to sabotage it.{{r|Invincible Iron Man Vol 2 26}} Stark Resilient later rebuilt a new improved version of the [[Asgard (City)|City of Asgard]] known as [[Asgardia]].{{r|Mighty Thor Vol 2 11}}

During the [[Mandarin (Earth-616)|Mandarin]]'s attack, Tony decided to leave the company in order to assure his friends' safety. [[Virginia Potts (Earth-616)|Pepper Potts]], the company's Chief Operating Officer, became Chief Executive Officer.{{r|Invincible Iron Man Vol 1 519}} During this time the name Stark was removed from the company name and it became known as simply Resilient.{{r|Superior Iron Man Vol 1 6}}

When Tony created a new industrial conglomerate named [[Stark Unlimited (Earth-616)|Stark Unlimited]], he reabsorbed back Stark Resilient, which became a corporate subsidiary of the new company.{{r|Tony Stark: Iron Man Vol 1 5}}

* [[James Rhodes (Earth-616)|Lt. Col. Jim Rhodes]] - Former [[United States Armed Forces (Earth-616)|U.S. Armed Forces]] Liaison
* [[Virginia Potts (Earth-616)|Pepper Potts]] - Chief Executive Officer;{{r|Invincible Iron Man Vol 1 519}} former Chief Operating Officer{{r|Invincible Iron Man Vol 2 26}}
* [[Leonard Pimacher (Earth-616)|Pim Pimacher]] - Unknown
* [[Sinclair Abbott (Earth-616)|Spymaster (Sinclair Abbott)]] - Impersonating [[Leonard Pimacher (Earth-616)|Pim Pimacher]]
* [[Timothy Cababa (Earth-616)|Tim Cababa]] - Unknown
* [[Walter Macken (Earth-616)|Walter Macken]] - Unknown

==Locations==
* [[File:Stark Resilient HQ (manufacturing plant).JPG|thumb|right|Stark Resilient Headquarters]] '''[[Stark Resilient Headquarters]]''', [[Seattle]], [[Washington (State)|Washington]] - Located in the same place as [[Anthony Stark (Earth-616)|Tony Stark]]'s residence, it contains the main plant production of cars.
* [[File:Stark Resilient Satellite Laboratories.JPG|thumb|right|150px|Satellite Laboratories]] '''Satellite Laboratories''', [[Paramus]], [[New Jersey (State)|New Jersey]] - A laboratory where [[Anthony Stark (Earth-616)|Iron Man]] and the [[New Avengers (Earth-616)|New Avengers]] battled [[Ultimo (Earth-616)|Ultimo]].

==Technology Developed==
* '''Repulsor car''' - A car created using only repulsor tech, totally eco-friendly. First appeared in {{cl|Invincible Iron Man Vol 2 30}}.
